data.title: My Friend's Book by Anatole France Nobel Prize 1921 First UK ed. 1913 scarce
data.meta_description: This is a scarce fist UK ed. of My Friend's Book by Anatole France. A translation by J. Lewis May.  Awarded Nobel Prize for Literature in 1921.
